list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (something) on a large scale using machinery.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a company that manufactured paint-by-number sets
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một công ty sản xuất bộ ba số

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: invent or fabricate (evidence or a story).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the tabloid industry that manufactures epochal discoveries out of thin air
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngành công nghiệp lá cải cung cấp những khám phá đại sinh ra khỏi không khí mỏng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the making of articles on a large scale using machinery.
